item.description:

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-14
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RECEIVED A CALL FROM IR4 FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON ARRIVAL IDENTIFIED THE LEAKING PACKAGE. PLACED SAID LEAKING PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY FOR TRANSPORT. TRANSPORTED TO DMP AREA FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.
